markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Terrain Scout](/Feats.aspx?ID=2049) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 188 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2047)

</column>

---

You gain the [Terrain Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=852) skill feat twice, choosing a different terrain each time. If you [Avoid Notice](/Actions.aspx?ID=511) while exploring and any allies use [Follow the Expert](/Actions.aspx?ID=514) to follow you as you do so, you can choose one of those allies to gain the benefit of any one Terrain Stalker feat you have.
name: Terrain Scout
